activities.title: Technology Stack Preferences
activities.description: Rank these technology stacks based on your interest in learning them (1 = most interested)

activities.title: Technical Challenge Selection
activities.description: Choose which technical challenge you'd be most excited to work on:

scenarios.title: Develop a Smart Study Assistant
scenarios.description: Build an AI that adapts to individual learning patterns and provides personalized recommendations

scenarios.title: Create a Real-Time Collaboration Platform
scenarios.description: Build a platform where teams can collaborate on projects with live updates and version control

scenarios.title: Design a Network Security Monitor
scenarios.description: Develop a system that detects and alerts about suspicious network activities

scenarios.title: Build a Predictive Analytics Dashboard
scenarios.description: Create a system that predicts trends from large datasets and visualizes insights

scenarios.title: Develop a Smart Campus System
scenarios.description: Create an integrated IoT solution for energy management and space optimization

activities.title: Advanced Tools & Technologies
activities.description: Match each tool/technology with its primary use case in modern development:

activities.title: Learning Path Priority
activities.description: Which learning path would you prioritize for the next 6 months?

paths.title: Advanced AI & Machine Learning
paths.description: Deep dive into neural networks, computer vision, and NLP

paths.title: Full-Stack Development Mastery
paths.description: Master modern frameworks, databases, and deployment strategies

paths.title: Cybersecurity Specialization
paths.description: Focus on ethical hacking, security analysis, and incident response

paths.title: Data Science & Analytics
paths.description: Advanced statistics, big data tools, and business intelligence

paths.title: IoT & Embedded Systems
paths.description: Hardware programming, sensor networks, and edge computing

questions.question: What is the main advantage of using version control systems like Git?
In object-oriented programming, what is encapsulation?
options: Combining data and methods that operate on that data
Creating multiple instances of a class
Inheriting properties from a parent class

questions.question: What is the purpose of an API (Application Programming Interface)?
options: To allow different software applications to communicate

questions.question: What is the main benefit of microservices architecture?
In database design, what is normalization primarily used for?
options: Reducing data redundancy and improving data integrity

questions.question: What is Edge Computing primarily designed to address?
options: Reducing latency by processing data closer to the source

questions.question: Which technology is fundamental to blockchain?

domainChallenges.prompt: You're developing an AI system for student grade prediction. What ethical considerations would you address? How would you ensure fairness across different student backgrounds? Describe your approach to making the AI transparent and accountable.

Design the architecture for a social learning platform that could handle 100,000+ concurrent users. Consider database design, caching strategies, load balancing, and real-time features. Explain your technology choices and scaling strategies.

Your organization's network shows signs of a potential data breach - unusual network traffic, failed login attempts, and suspicious file access. Outline your incident response plan, including immediate actions, investigation steps, and recovery procedures.

A university wants to improve student retention rates. You have access to academic records, attendance data, library usage, and campus activity participation. Design an analytics solution that identifies at-risk students and suggests intervention strategies.

Design an IoT solution for traffic management in a smart city. Consider sensors, data processing, real-time decision making, and integration with existing infrastructure. How would your system adapt to changing traffic patterns and emergency situations?

Create a system that combines AI, web development, and IoT to solve a real-world problem. Choose a specific use case (like smart healthcare, precision agriculture, or energy management) and explain how these technologies would work together to create value.
